BAT.JO.summary: Brait PLC, an investment holding company, focuses on its investment portfolio of sizeable unlisted businesses operating in the consumer sector. Its primary investment portfolio includes Virgin Active, Premier, Iceland Foods, and New Look. The company's New Look business offers clothing products and footwear for women and teenage girls; and provides menswear through online. It also operates 243 health clubs under Virgin Active in South Africa, the United Kingdom, Italy, Australia, Namibia, Botswana, Thailand, and Singapore. In addition, the company operates Premier, which produces fast moving consumer goods, including wheat flour, maize meal, bread, feminine hygiene products, sugar confectionery, pasta, biscuit, animal feeds, and other food products in South Africa, Eswatini, Lesotho, and Mozambique. Further, it manufactures and supplies glass packaging products to the beverage and food companies through Consol in South Africa, Nigeria, and Kenya. Brait PLC was incorporated in 2011 and is based in San Gwann, Malta.

CAGPF.summary: Cryptology Asset Group p.l.c., an asset manager, invests in crypto assets and crypto companies, and advises blockchain based businesses. It also trades in crypto currencies and tokens. The company is based in Sliema, Malta.
